entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
